name: Love Cat
description:
Do you known that in a few months,  a cat couple  and its offspring can produce 25 000 kittens ? 

Cat Love is a serious game to inform people about cat sterilization. You adopted two very cute cats. What do you do with them from now ? You can choose to sterilize them at the beginning or wait and see what it will happen.

Click on the cat with mouse to sterilize the cats.
